title: Add
content: </> PlayerMaid.Add( player: any,-- The player that will be in charge of cleaning object: any-- The object that will be cleaned ) → () Indexes object in player's objects that will be cleaned

title: Clean
content: </> PlayerMaid.Clean() → () Cleans up all the objects on every player, Does not disconnect player adding/removing signals.

title: CleanPlayer
content: </> PlayerMaid.CleanPlayer( userId: number-- The player's UserId that you want to clean. ) → () Cleans up all the objects on specified player.

title: Destroy
content: </> PlayerMaid.Destroy() → () Cleans up all the objects on every player, will also disconnect all player adding/removing signals.
